An amazing game. This is a very unique puzzle game where you can use portals to get to the end.

Portal and Portal 2 are the most creative games I have played in a while. While Portals have been involved in pop culture for years, making a puzzle game based on physics and momentum using portal technology as a base is such a fun gameplay loop that I could play these 20 stages over and over. In Portal 2 the stages are more plentiful, more creative, and contain a better story. However, that's not to underwrite the quality of Portal. I highly recommend this game, and considering the low price point (and that it comes in the Orange Box) there is almost no reason to play Portal.
This game was and still great game and always will be an amazing game!!

시간이 흘러도 괜찮은 그래픽. 오래된 1인칭 3D 게임이라 3D멀미는 요즘 게임에 비해 심하지만 좋은 게임성, 혁신적인 게임 시스템을 개발한 게임. 추가로 마지막에 나오는 개쩌는 엔딩크레딧. 정말 재미있음 이 겜을 접한 후로 퍼즐겜에 빠져 퍼즐겜을 좀 했었는데 내 뇌는 쓰레기였구나 를 깨닫고 걍 하던 fps나 하게됨

tl;dr this game is fun and 100% worth the 10 dollars or less on sale. this game is so well made and the replay value is quite high. the chambers are built to the point where you will never get stuck for a while but it still challenges your brain. even after you beat the game you can go back and replay it again, find fun/cool glitches, speedrun etc. the community is cool too.
There isn't much that hasn't already been said and I'm not gonna be the one to think of it, Portal is a classic that you should play at some point in your life.

Fantastic. Cleverly designed puzzles, entertaining and witty dialog, and some of the most menacing music I've heard in a long while. Highly recommend.

An absolute classic. Portal is super fun even over ten years after its release. I love how replayable it is and how much extra content (challenges, ect) there is even after you beat the base game. The voice acting is iconic and hilarious and the graphics are amazing considering when it came out. 11/10 would recommend.

Простенькая двухкнопочная головоломка на два часа. Перепроходить или играть в бонусные карты (усложняющие пройденные), чтобы собрать все ачивки - желания не возникло. Рецензия не отрицательная лишь потому, что игра технически необычна, что же, Вальвы умеют заинтересовать игрока. Но брать за полную стоимсть не рекомендую, по акции со скидками 75-90% самое то.
